original_text: For I delivered to you as of first importance what I also received: that Christ died for our sins in accordance with the Scriptures,
korean_text: 내가 받은 것을 먼저 너희에게 전하였노니 이는 성경대로 그리스도께서 우리 죄를 위하여 죽으시고

sentences.original_text: For I delivered to you as of first importance
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 가장 먼저 전달한 것은

sentences.original_text: that Christ died for our sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리스도께서 우리 죄를 위해 죽으셨다는 것과
